release dates: USA::13 June 2015                            (Colorado Independent Women of Film)

5.title: Threshold
5.plot: Jesse and Jami have gotten themselves in yet another mess. Captured and tortured for information by the nefarious villain and his unorthodox methods of torture, Jesse is about to reach his breaking point. Can Jami hold out?

imdb.plot outline: When the world is in crisis and calls for heroes, it calls someone else...but when they're busy then they call The 2nd Unit. Watch as agents/detectives Jesse and Jami get called into action to foil the plans of evil-doers, and kill the bad guys...if they don't kill each other first. The 2nd Unit follows the guise of taking clichés of 90's-2000's Buddy-Cop action films, and putting a fun satirical twist on them. With reoccurring themes of men vs. women comedy and taking the reality-bending moments of classic action films, and putting a realistic perspective on them, The 2nd Unit is as exciting as it is funny.

When the world is in crisis and calls for heroes, it calls someone else...but when they're busy then they call _The 2nd Unit_ (qv). Watch as agents/detectives Jesse and Jami get called into action to foil the plans of evil-doers, and kill the bad guys...if they don't kill each other first. _The 2nd Unit_ (qv) follows the guise of taking clichés of 90's-2000's Buddy-Cop action films, and putting a fun satirical twist on them. With reoccurring themes of men vs. women comedy and taking the reality-bending moments of classic action films, and putting a realistic perspective on them, _The 2nd Unit_ (qv) is as exciting as it is funny.::Nathan W.
